meta.name: The Great 8
meta.description: Street racers battle at rough, untested tracks across the country and earn points depending on how they perform. Whoever has the most points at the end is crowned the true No Prep King!

videos.title: Eight is Enough
videos.overview: The top 8 racers from the qualifier compete for $15,000 and extra points.

videos.title: Rainstorm Rebuild
videos.overview: Justin Swanstrom makes hasty repairs after a catastrophic failure.

videos.title: In a Groove
videos.overview: Jerry Bird hopes to build his lead but Daddy Dave is on a hot streak.

videos.title: All is Fair in Love and Racing
videos.overview: The top eight face off and Lizzy and Kye must race each other again.

videos.title: Failed Test
videos.overview: Testing derails Ryan and Dean as the Top Eight battle it out in Kentucky.

videos.title: Hurts So Good
videos.overview: The top 8 encounter explosions, hurt transmissions and locked-up rear ends.

videos.title: Heated in Houston
videos.overview: It's getting hot in Houston and the racers struggle to make fast passes.

videos.title: Holy Shocker
videos.overview: Racers arrive in Idaho and Kye unveils his brand new NPK Shocker.

videos.title: Sick Ride
videos.overview: Ryan shows up to Arizona under the weather and unsure if he can even race.

videos.title: Hot Air
videos.overview: At high altitude, turbo cars drivers try to even the odds at the tree.

videos.title: No Grudges
videos.overview: Kye has a catastrophic failure and has to scramble to fix his car.

videos.title: Nervous Breakdown
videos.overview: In Rockingham, Lizzy, Jerry and Ryan all experience major car issues.

videos.title: Broken Engagement
videos.overview: In Alabama, Lizzy and Kye draw each other and war ensues.

videos.title: Double Point Drama
videos.overview: The field tries to catch Ryan Martin during a double points weekend.

videos.title: Call Me Capt. Kickoff Special
videos.overview: It's time to meet the eight team captains in an all-new season of No Prep!

videos.title: The Race to $100K
videos.overview: No Prep drivers kick off the Great 8 Individual Championships to win $100K.

videos.title: Making It in Minnesota
videos.overview: As racers compete for points in the Great 8, new drivers make waves.

videos.title: Call It Quits
videos.overview: The competition in Kentucky turns tense when Kye and Lizzy call it quits.

videos.title: Newbie in New England
videos.overview: The drivers arrive in NH for the fourth race in the Great 8 Championship.
